newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Novell shrs hold steady.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Novell shrs hold steady.

text.p: Traders said shares of Novell Inc were little changed after-hours from the stock's close of 10-7/8.

The software company posted fourth-quarter earnings of $0.17 per share compared with $0.16 per share last year. Its quarterly revenues declined to $383.7 million compared to $480.5 million the comparable period last year.
The First Call consensus estimate for Novell's fourth quarter was $0.17 per share.

The New York Stock Exchange said its session one volume was 14,400 shares compared with Monday's volume of 18,300 shares. Session two volume was 7,050,100 shares compared to 2,998,600 shares on Monday.
